# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

A tender announcement has been made for the provision of Elder Helper services to Correctional Service Canada (CSC). This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) inviting interested suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities.

## Background

CSC requires Elder programming to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders. Elder Helpers are needed to provide support and supplementation to the work of Elders, enhancing Indigenous programming.

## Scope of Work

The selected supplier will provide Elder programming and services to Indigenous offenders. Tasks include assisting offenders in benefiting from traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions, coordinating and supervising offenders during traditional ceremonies, conducting group discussions and teachings, and providing counseling services.

## Requirements

* Providing services to Indigenous offenders in Quebec (except NCR)
* Performing tasks in French
* Meeting the following minimum essential requirements:
	+ Assisting and supporting Elders
	+ Providing counseling and guidance according to traditions and teachings
	+ Conducting group discussions
	+ Assisting others in preparing reports (verbal and written)
* Having a minimum of 2 years of cumulative experience in the above areas over the past 10 years

## Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers interested in providing the services must submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in the notice on or before the closing date and time. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

## Contact Information

Kim Lavallée
Acting Regional Supply and Contract Officer, Regional Service Center
Correctional Service Canada
Telephone: 514-235-9156
E-mail: [kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca)

## Notice Details

* Notice Title: Elder Helper services
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Estimated Contract Value: $79,402.10 (GST/HST extra)

Please note that this is an ACAN, and the Government reserves the right to award the contract to the pre-identified supplier. However, other suppliers may still submit a statement of capabilities if they believe they can meet the requirements.
